ADC Channel Selection
[ADC Macros]

Collaboration diagram for ADC Channel Selection:

Detailed Description

Select the ADC channel to be converted.


Defines

#define Adc_clear_mux()   (ADMUX &= ~((1<<MUX4)|(1<<MUX3)|(1<<MUX2)|(1<<MUX1)|(1<<MUX0)) )
